resources.string: Hey, psiu!! Time to update your pass, huh ?!
Update your pass details to stay informed!
Have you updated your Battle Pass today?
Update your information to have more control over your pass!
Its time to update your pass, huh?!
The pass is only %1$d days away!
Its time to update your pass, huh ?!
The pass is only %1$d days away!
Do you wanna play a game?
Wow, youre early! But, I suggest you stay updated!
Vish, youre a little late, my Friend! Update your pass to make up for lost time!
May the knife be with you!
Early, you are! Continue on the path of Light, Young Padawan!
Late, you are! Avoid the dark side of the Pass, Young Padawan!
Carpe diem. Enjoy today, guys!
Wow huh, youre in advance! But, I suggest you stay updated!

Never hate your enemies, it affects your judgment!
